description: Streamline the hiring process with this detailed job application template.
name: Job Application Form

steps.title: Join Our Team!
steps.text: We are excited to learn more about you and how you can contribute to our team. To apply for a position, please complete the form below. Ensure that all required fields are filled out accurately and provide as much detail as possible to help us understand your qualifications and experience.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for communication regarding your application.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for contact purposes.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Position Applied For
blocks.help: Indicate the job position you are applying for.
blocks.name: position

blocks.label: Resume/CV
blocks.help: Upload your CV or resume in PDF or Word format.
blocks.name: resume

blocks.label: LinkedIn Profile
blocks.help: Optional: Provide a link to your LinkedIn profile.
blocks.name: linkedin

blocks.label: Availability
blocks.help: Indicate your availability to start the position.
blocks.name: availability

blocks.label: Salary Expectations
blocks.help: Optional: State your salary expectations for the position.
blocks.name: salary_expectations

blocks.label: Additional Information
blocks.help: Optional: Include any additional information you believe is relevant to your application.
blocks.name: additional_information
